text: To Beast or Not To Beast is an album released by Lordi. It was released on 1 march 2013. == Track listing == # We're Not Bad for the Kids (We're Worse) # I Luv Ugly # The Riff # Something Wicked This Way Comes # I'm the Best # Horrifiction # Happy New Fear # Schizo Doll # Candy for the Cannibal # Sincerely with Love # SCG6: Otus' Butcher Clinic Category:Lordi albums Category:2013 albums
title: To Beast or Not To Beast
